article.title: Hairy Black Holes and Duality in an Extended Supergravity Model

choices: The Lagrangian density for a bosonic field in N=2 supergravity
The equation for a minimally coupled scalar field
The equation for the scalar potential in designer gravity
The Euclidean action for a black hole
The scalar potential as a function of the dilaton field
The free energy of a hairy black hole
The electric field strength of the N=2 supergravity theory

multiple_choice_question.text: What physical quantity does Equation (73) represent?
choices: The entropy density of a hairy black hole
The temperature of a hairy black hole
The mass of a hairy black hole
The scalar charge of a hairy black hole

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the interpretation of Equation (106) in the context of AdS/CFT duality?
choices: It describes the electric-magnetic duality of the bulk theory
It represents the scalar charge of a hairy black hole
It defines the superpotential in terms of the boundary VEV
It relates the black hole mass to the boundary conditions
